sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card>
    <v-card-title>Vaccination Schedule</v-card-title>
    <v-card-text>
      <v-data-table
        :headers="headers"
        :items="items"
        class="elevation-1 custom-table"
        disable-pagination
        hide-default-footer
        dense
      >
        <!-- Slot para personalizar la columna 'Type' -->
        <template v-slot:[`item.type`]="{ item }">
          <v-chip
            v-if="item.type === 'Overdue'"
            label
            outlined
            class="ma-0 chip1"
          >
            {{ item.type }}
          </v-chip>
          <v-chip
            v-else-if="item.type === 'Noncore'" 
            label
            outlined
            class="ma-0 chip2"
          >
            {{ item.type }}
          </v-chip>
          <v-chip
            v-else-if="item.type === 'Core'"
            label
            outlined
            class="ma-0 chip3"
          >
            {{ item.type }}
          </v-chip>
        </template>

        <!-- Slot para personalizar la columna 'Veterinarian' -->
        <template v-slot:[`item.veterinarian`]="{ item }">
          <v-chip
            label
            outlined
            class="ma-0 chip-vet"
          >
            {{ item.veterinarian }}
          </v-chip>
        </template>
      </v-data-table>
    </v-card-text>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      headers: [
        { text: 'Name', value: 'name' },
        { text: 'Type', value: 'type' },
        { text: 'Date', value: 'date' },
        { text: 'Veterinarian', value: 'veterinarian' },
      ],
      items: [
        { name: 'Rabies', type: 'Overdue', date: '01 Dec 2023', veterinarian: 'Find veterinarian' },
        { name: 'Bordetella', type: 'Noncore', date: '11 Dec 2024', veterinarian: 'James Grey' },
        { name: 'Distemper', type: 'Core', date: '27 Jun 2024', veterinarian: 'Jim Brown' },
        { name: 'Calicivirus', type: 'Core', date: '16 Sep 2024', veterinarian: 'Helen Brooks' },
      ],
    };
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.v-data-table {
  border-radius: 12px;
  background-color: #f8f9fc;
}

/* Estilo personalizado para el header de la tabla */
.custom-table .v-data-table-header th {
  background-color: #f1f3f6 !important;
  color: #5c6c7c !important;
  font-weight: 600 !important;

}

.v-card-title {
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #5c6c7c;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}

/* Estilos para los chips personalizados */
.chip1 {
  color: #d32f2f;
  background-color: #fce4ec !important;
  border-color: #f8bbd0 !important;
}

.chip2 {
  color: #f57c00;
  background-color: #fff3e0 !important;
  border-color: #ffe0b2 !important;
}

.chip3 {
  color: #388e3c;
  background-color: #e8f5e9 !important;
  border-color: #c8e6c9 !important;
}

.chip-vet {
  color: #1976d2;
  background-color: #e3f2fd !important;
  border-color: #90caf9 !important;
}

.v-chip {
  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: 14px;
  border-radius: 16px !important;
}
</style>
